attributes.action: keep the Britannia on the 50p coin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe the Britannia is an important symbol (in British coinage) and in Britain as a whole.  Our proud song "Rule Britannia" says it well '...Britain never... will be slaves' it is smal changes such as this which turns us into slaves and we will no longer stand idly by  as our freedoms are taken from us.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
